attributes.action: Keep dance schools & drama clubs open during this lockdown period!
attributes.additional_details: If we can keep schools open & exercise outdoors then we can we can keep these clubs open. The arts is going downhill as it is so take it away from the future generation and it will be lost before we know it. It’s not just a hobby and it’s not just something we do for a laugh, it’s our love and our life.
attributes.background: Closing dance schools and drama clubs was not the right choice. To millions of kids all across England it’s just as important as academic education. How can you expect children to be okay with the fact that their love, their passion and their hobby has been taken away from them.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

Since you started your petition, the national lockdown has ended. You could start a new petition calling for changes to the current tiered restrictions, if that's what you'd like to see happen.

You might also like to sign the following petition:

Allow all dance studios to open with covid safety precautions in place
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557275
